org.apache.river.test.impl.norm

Interface LeaseBackEnd

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.jini.security.proxytrust.ProxyTrust, Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LeaseBackEndImpl

    public interface LeaseBackEnd
extends Remote, net.jini.security.proxytrust.ProxyTrust
    Interface that grators of test leases implement so the test lease proxy objects can communicate back to the grantor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  LeaseBackEnd.RenewResults

        getProxyVerifier

    • Method Detail

      • renew

        Object renew(int id,
             long extension)
      throws net.jini.core.lease.LeaseDeniedException,
             net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException,
             RemoteException
        Called by the lease when its renew method is called.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of this lease, used by the grantor to identify it
        extension - The duration argument passed to the Lease.renew() call
        Returns:
        If the method return a Long this is the new expiration of the lease, if it returns a Throwable that object should be thrown. If the the value is a Throwable it should be and Error, RuntimeException, or RemoteException
        Throws:
        net.jini.core.lease.LeaseDeniedException
        net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException
        RemoteException

      • cancel

        Throwable cancel(int id)
          throws net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException,
                 RemoteException
        Called by the lease when its cancel method is called.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of this lease, used by the grantor to identify it
        Returns:
        If this method returns a non-null value that the caller should throw that object, other wise the caller should return normally. If the the value is non-null it should be and Error, RuntimeException, or RemoteException.
        Throws:
        net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException
        RemoteException

      • renewAll

        Object renewAll(int[] ids,
                long[] extensions)
         throws RemoteException
        Called by the lease map when its renewAll method is called.
        Parameters:
        ids - The ids of this leases, used by the grantor to identify them
        extensions - The duration argument for each lease from the map
        Returns:
        If the method returns a RenewResults object the object should be used to update the leases in map and/or throw an appropriate LeaseMapException. If the returned value is a Throwable that object should be thrown. If the the value is Throwable it should be and Error, RuntimeException, or RemoteException.
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • cancelAll

        Throwable cancelAll(int[] ids)
             throws net.jini.core.lease.LeaseMapException,
                    RemoteException
        Called by the lease map when its cancelAll method is called.
        Parameters:
        ids - The ids of this leases, used by the grantor to identify them
        Returns:
        If this method returns a non-null value that the caller should throw that object, other wise the caller should return normally. If the the value is non-null it should be and Error, RuntimeException, or RemoteException
        Throws:
        net.jini.core.lease.LeaseMapException
        RemoteException
